body_html:
Hi, guys,

Also When i used small RNN, such as 1*128, the same exception raise on worker 0 when I restore from the checkpoint, after worker run another hundreds of steps from the ckpt. And after worker 0 is down, worker 1 can continue running until i shut down ps server manually.
Fresh running on small RNN is fine as I said in the post.

I have monitored the memory usage, it is always below 10%.

Thank you!

Get Outlook for iOShttps://aka.ms/o0ukef

@mrryhttps://github.com/mrry Can you take a look?

body:
Hi, guys,

Also When i used small RNN, such as 1*128, the same exception raise on worker 0 when I restore from the checkpoint, after worker run another hundreds of  steps from the ckpt. And after worker 0 is down, worker 1 can continue running until i shut down ps server manually.
Fresh running on small RNN is fine as I said in the post.

I have monitored the memory usage, it is always below 10%.

Thank you!
